levels.description: Attack range expands and Trait effect increases to <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_to_hp_recovery_ratio:0%}</>. Particles no longer disappear, and all allies in attack range gain <$ba.inspire>Inspiration</> equal to <@ba.vup>{max_hp:0%}</> of Civilight Eterna's max HP. Redistribute HP of all allies in attack range every <@ba.vup>2</>s.
